pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sabbapaṃsukūliko susāne viharati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:1.3: So manussehi diyyamānaṃ na icchati paṭiggahetuṃ, susānepi rukkhamūlepi ummārepi ayyavosāṭitakāni sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:1.5: “kathañhi nāma ayaṃ bhikkhu amhākaṃ ayyavosāṭitakāni sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjissati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:1.6: Theroyaṃ bhikkhu vaṭharo manussamaṃsaṃ maññe khādatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:1.7: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:1.8: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:1.9: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhu adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āharissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:1.10: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu, adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āharasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:1.13: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āharissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:1.15: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:1.16: “Yo pana bhikkhu adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āhareyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:1.17: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū udakadantapone kukkuccāyanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:2.4: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:2.5: “Yo pana bhikkhu adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āhareyya, aññatra udakadantaponā, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:3.1.8: kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā nissaggiyena vā dente hatthapāse ṭhito kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā paṭiggaṇhāti, etaṃ dinnaṃ nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:3.1.10: udakadantaponaṃ ṭhapetvā yaṃ kiñci ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ, eso āhāro nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:3.2.1: Appaṭiggahitake appaṭiggahitakasaññī adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āhāreti, aññatra udakadantaponā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:3.2.2: Appaṭiggahitake vematiko adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āhāreti, aññatra udakadantaponā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:3.2.3: Appaṭiggahitake paṭiggahitakasaññī adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āhāreti, aññatra udakadantaponā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:3.3.3: cattāri mahāvikaṭāni sati paccaye asati kappiyakārake sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjati,
